data.eml:eml: A new species of Tiwaripotamon Bott, 1970, from northern Vietnam, with notes on T. vietnamicum (Dang & Ho, 2002) and T. edostilus Ng & Yeo, 2001 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Potamidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Shih, Hsi-Te, Do, Van Tu (2014): A new species of Tiwaripotamon Bott, 1970, from northern Vietnam, with notes on T. vietnamicum (Dang & Ho, 2002) and T. edostilus Ng & Yeo, 2001 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Potamidae). Zootaxa 3764 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.1.2
